name: The Adventurer vs Slimes
description:
A simple platformer in which you need to kill all slimes within 50 seconds. My best time is 22 seconds left on the clock. It can't be improved, trust me.

Made with Godot after following UmaiPixel's platformer tutorial.

All visual assets taken from itch.io (rvros, foxly)

Sound effects from freesound.org

Music is Kyoto from Tekken 1.
